comments:
Build 1.2 RC1

The C editor is making an illegal internal reference which breaks it if you try 
to install CDT into current Eclipse 3.0 builds (3.0 M4). Classes in packages 
with "internal" in the path are not API.

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.eclipse.ui.internal.editors.text.EditorsPlugin.

I've fix this in my repository, but I beleive Dave as a much
